name: Daisy Pushers
description:
Poor Kev used the wrong Seedboom on his garden and grew himself a horde of zombies, help Kev out please.

This game was made for the 2022 Global Game Jam!

The usual controls:

W,A,S,D = Move

E = Interact

R = Reload

L Click = Shoot

R Click = Aim

esc. = Pause

A solo game jam

Animations - Mixamo, Audio - Epidemic Sound
